item.title: Bother Sofa
item.description: .img-position{ box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1); text-align: ; } Collaborator: Fora Form Introduction In this task, we can make a radical design for Fora Form Design Brief The backrest of Bother-Sofa is made of elastic rubber band and the user will feel the “wave” if another colleague joins of leave the set. Unlike normal office furniture which tries their best to avoid the influence between the colleagues, Bother-Sofa aims at making the colleagues to bother others when they sit or leave the sofa, encouraging them to talk, interactive with others and arouse their empathy through this “bothering experience”.

item.title: Solar Popcorn
item.description: .img-position{ box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1); text-align: ; } Collaborator: Fora Form Introduction In this task, we can choose one of the Fora Form’s chair and make an incremental design for it. In this case, I chose the very classic popcorn chair. Design brief Solar popcorn is an incremental upgrading of the classic popcorn chair, it adopts thin-film solar panel as the backrest and sitting cushion of the chair to provide power for charging a cellphone.

item.title: Coding-Arm
item.description: Design brief This design lets the children plan the movements of hands in advance. Then they can control the angle, the barrel and the mechanical arm to finish the action. In the process, children could understand that even the complex arm movements can be disassembled into several simple and repeated steps. Therefore, it contributes to the cultivation of children’s programming thinking. click to enlarge the image and if not clear enlough, please use the reading mode fo the browser img{ box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.

item.title: GuardRailer
item.description: Design brief In this design, the cleaner hangs on the highway guardrail of “W” shape. Then the cleaner can clean the highway guardrail without people’s efforts. What’s more, the cleaner doesn’t occupy any highway track. In addition, the cleaner will adopt nozzle with high-temperature steam, which contributes to saving much water. click to enlarge the image and if not clear enlough, please use the reading mode fo the browser img{ box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.

item.title: INIS
item.description: Design brief Product system is generated by incorporating smart working light, smart blinds and solar tracking station together. Blinds are adjusted according to the solar position and reflections of buildings.
